name: Beras Kencur
description: A well known traditional Indonesian herb drink which is trusted to have many benefits for health
directions: Wash the rice in the water before use
Soak the rice with water for around 3 hours
Peal, wash and chop galangal and tumeric
Blend the tumeric, galangal, and rice with blender and wait until all the ingredients is smooth
Boil the water and pour all the ingredients into the water
Stir constantly for a few minutes
Let it cold and store it in the refrigerator. It tastes better when it's cold
